updates.title: Yann LeCun launches AMI Labs, a new 'world model' AI startup after leaving Meta, drawing intense industry attention for its potential breakthrough approach to AI reasoning and planning.
Google Photos introduces AI-powered meme generation feature using Gemini Nano technology, allowing users to create personalized memes from their photo collections.
Meta temporarily pauses teen access to AI characters globally across all apps while developing an updated version with better safety features and user experience.

OpenAI CEO Sam Altman plans first India visit in nearly a year as major AI summit in New Delhi prepares to host executives from Meta, Google, and Anthropic, signaling increased focus on international AI expansion.

Voice AI infrastructure startup LiveKit reaches $1 billion valuation after raising $100M Series B, powering OpenAI's ChatGPT voice mode and positioning itself as critical AI communication infrastructure.
